properties.name: 500 West Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Thetravelsage    500 W Broadway, San Diego, CAThe historic 500 West Hotel is located in a renovated 1920\'s landmark building that stands within one block of the Santa Fe Depot. This property is three blocks from Horton Plaza and within nine blocks of Gaslamp Quarter, Embarcadero, San Diego Convention Center and Petco Park. San Diego Zoo is just three miles away and SeaWorld is six-and-one-half miles from the hotel. Guests arriving via San Diego International Airport are a two-and-one-half mile drive from the hotel.

properties.name: Bellagio
properties.description: Posted by Thetravelsage 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd Las Vegas NVLocation. Rising 36 Stories Above The Las Vegas Strip And Fronted By Approximately 1,000 Fountains Dancing To Opera And Classical Music, The Tuscan-style Bellagio Is Located In Las Vegas, Nev. The Bellagio Is Connected By Walkways To Both Caesars Palace And Bally\'s Las Vegas. Hotel Features. Two Thousand Glass Blossoms Conceived By Renowned Artist Dale Chihuly Brighten The Hotel\'s Grand Lobby. Via Bellagio Shopes Include A Host Of Designer Boutiques Housed Beneath A Ceiling Of Glass And Wrought Iron. Dining Venues Include Yellowtail Sushi Restaurant And Bar Specializing In Sushi, Sashimi, Tempura And Hand Rolls. Picasso, A French-mediterranean Restaurant With Fountain Views, Has Original Picasso Oil Paintings. Michael Mina Hosts His Namesake Restaurant That Serves Mediterannean And California-style Fare. Le Cirque Is An Outpost Of The Famed New York City Restaurant. Jasmine Offers Cantonese Cuisine Where The Music Is Synchronized With The Bellagio\'s Famed Fountains. Illuminated Aqua-hued Glass, And Rich Marble, Granite, And Onyx Accents Embellish The Spa & Salon At Bellagio. Pampering Treatments Include Lastone Massage, The Fleurs Garden Aromatherapy Treatment And The Detox-thalasso Seaweed Body Treatment. The Bellagio Gallery Of Fine Art Exhibits Renowned Artists\' Works From Museums Around The World.

properties.name: Blue Benn Diner
properties.description: Posted by Thetravelsage bennington, vtContrary to the typical retro reform dining experience with Marilyn Monroe in a hoop skirt and roller skates this sometimes referred to as “a gourmet” diner boasts all the classics and none of the fuss. Standing proudly along its current spot on Route 7 since 1949 the Blue Ben remains a true-blue hash house. (check out my last post for Vermont vacation ideas)

properties.name: Casa Laguna Inn & Spa
properties.description: Posted by Thetravelsage         2510 S. Coast Highway, Laguna Beach, CA, United StatesTerraced On A Hillside In Laguna Beach, California Amid Tropic Gardens And Flower Splashed Patios, This Laguna Beach Hotel Exudes An Ambiance Of Bygone Days When Laguna Beach, Was Developing Its Reputation As An Artists* Colony And Hideaway For Hollywood Film Stars. The Mission Style Architecture Of This Laguna Beach Bed And Breakfast Set Below Towering Palms Framing Views Of The Blue Pacific Invites You To Linger, To Slow Your Pace To That Of Another Less Hurried Era. This Feeling Will Be Reinforced As You Take Your Breakfast Or Afternoon Refreshments In The Historic Mission House Or On One Of The Many Secluded Patios.

properties.name: Encore
properties.description: Posted by Thetravelsage  3131 Las Vegas Blvd Las Vegas, NV 89109 from 69.00 USD Location. Located Next Door To Flagship Property Wynn Las Vegas, Encore Is A Distinct Destination Resort With Its Own Repertoire Of Accommodations, Culinary Offerings, And Leisure Activities. Hotel Features. Encore S Restaurants Showcase Award-winning Chefs--In Residence All The Time. The Poolside Xs Club, Created By Nightlife Entrepreneur Victor Drai, Has A Sexy And Sophisticated Vibe. Guestrooms. Extra-spacious Suites Feature Floor-to-ceiling Windows With Dramatic Views. Suites Also Offer Large-screen Flat-panel Tvs, Luxury Bedding, And Separate Soaking Tubs And Showers. Expert Tip. People-watch While You Play. With A Commanding View Of The Pool Area, The Encore Las Vegas Casino Features Non-reflective Glass That Allows People Within The Casino To See The Pool Area At Night Without Reflecting The Lights Of The Casino. Quick Facts * o Check In Time - 3 P.m. o Check Out Time - 12 P.m. o Credit Card Required o Floors - 50 o Guestrooms - 2,034 o Hotel Built - 2008 o Interior Corridors o Limo/Town Car Service Available * o Minimum Check-in Age - 21 o Multilingual Staff o Photo Identification Required

properties.name: Grant Park Music Festival: Lollapalooza
properties.description: Posted by Thetravelsage 205 E Randolph Dr, Chicago, ILA massive music festival with everything and everyone you could want

properties.name: Harbor View Inn
properties.description: Posted by Thetravelsage         28 W Cabrillo Blvd, Santa Barbara, CACentral Coast\'s premier beach front luxury boutique resort hotel in Santa Barbara, California. Our exceptional oceanfront location across from the white sands of West Beach and historic Stearns Wharf and 4-Diamond services provide all you need to experience the best of Santa Barbara.

properties.name: Jackie Gleason Theater
properties.description: Posted by Thetravelsage 1700 Washington Ave., Miami Beach, FL, United StatesModest Mouse and Jerry Seinfeld at the Fillmore Jackie Gleason Theater Miami Beach

properties.name: Luxor Hotel and Casino - RA
properties.description: Posted by Thetravelsage     3900 Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NVLuxor Hotel and Casino is a 30-story pyramid, two 22-story towers cloaked in bronze glass and a 10-story sphinx. The world\'s most powerful light beam, with 42.3 billion candlepower, shines from atop the pyramid. This light is visible at flight level 250 miles away and from outer space. Weekend Champagne Brunches are available at More Restaurant. The 24-hour lobby lounge, Aurora, features lighting that resembles the Aurora Borealis and offers European bottle service, wines and martinis poured at the table. The hotel offers four outdoor pools and rentable poolside cabanas. Pampering treatments are available at Nurture, the spa and health club, which includes complimentary fruit, juice and water, ginger-scented showers and spa tubs. Teeth whitening, Warm Buttered Stone Massage and Citrus Marine Detox are popular treatments. A precise recreation of King Tut\'s tomb is available at The Tomb and Museum of King Tutankhamun, with replicas of guardian statues, the sarcophagus and pottery, baskets, vases and beds. The hotel\'s clubs feature topless revues, musicians and the comedian Carrot Top. Criss Angel\'s Mindfreak A&E television show is filmed on property.

properties.name: Maui Seaside Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Thetravelsage 100 W Kaahumanu Ave, Kahului, HILocation. * The Maui Seaside Hotel Is Located In Maui, Hawaii. * Adjacent To Kahului Bay * Across The Street From Kaahumanu Center * One-quarter Mile From Downtown Kahului

properties.name: Maui Seaside Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Thetravelsage   845 Burrard St Vancouver, BC V6Z2K6 Location. The Sutton Place Hotel - Vancouver, Located In British Columbia, Canada, Stands Around The Corner From Robson Street\'s Eclectic Shops. Vancouver\'s Business District Is Positioned Two Blocks From This Hotel, And Historic Gastown Is Less Than One Mile Away. Hotel Features. This Hotel Has Received The Conde Nast Traveler Gold List And 2005 Travel And Leisure Top 500 Greatest Hotels Awards. Fine French Cuisine, Created With Pacific Northwest Produce, Attracts Attention At The Hotel\'s Signature Restaurant, Fleuri. Fleuri\'s Chef Is Happy To Honor Guests\' Special Requests For Specific Selections That Are Not Listed On The Restaurant\'s Menu. Gerard Lounge Is Reminiscent Of A Private English Club, Complete With A Fireplace, Leather Furnishings, Wood Paneling, Soft Lighting And Traditional Landscape Paintings. A Staffed Business Center, Complimentary Downtown Limousine Service, And Close Proximity To Vancouver\'s Business District Add Elements Of Convenience To This Hotel\'s Amenities. Vida Wellness Spa Offers An Array Of Body Treatments That Include Swedish Techniques, Shiatsu Massage And Hot And Cool Stone Therapies. An Atrium Pool And Spa Tub Are Adjoined By A Patio Courtyard.

properties.name: Red Bull Air Race: San Diego
properties.description: Posted by Thetravelsage Red Bull Air Races and High Octane Excitement. Not to mention the plethora of other entertainment and recreation there is to be had in San Diego

properties.name: Roosevelt Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Thetravelsage       45 E 45th St, , NYThe Roosevelt Hotel Reflects Neo-classical Style With Tiffany Crystal Chandeliers, Gilt Trim, Coffered Ceilings, Marble Floors And A Life-sized Statue Of Teddy Roosevelt. Artistic Renderings Of The Hotel\'s Namesake, Theodore Roosevelt, Grace The Walls Of The Roosevelt Grill That Serves Elegant American-style Buffets, Breakfasts, Lunches And Dinners. Guy Lombardo And Lawrence Welk Began Their Illustrious Careers At The Roosevelt Grill. The Madison Club Lounge Features A Glowing Fireplace, A Rich Mahogany Bar, Leather Seating And Late-night Bar Service.

properties.name: Santa Barbara Historical Museum
properties.description: Posted by Thetravelsage 136 E De La Guerra St, Santa Barbara, CAThe Santa Barbara Museum of Art and History is pretty Awesome!

properties.name: St. Edward State Park: Home of Washington Brewers Festival
properties.description: Posted by Thetravelsage    14500 Juanita Drive NE seattle, waIndulge in the culmination of the most popular and obscure micro-brews from around the country with over 200 different beers on tap. Saint Edward State Park is a 316-acre day-use park with 3,000 feet of freshwater shoreline on Lake Washington. Once a Catholic seminary, the park\'s rich history reflects in its grounds and architecture. Walks along the undeveloped lakeshore are peaceful and give the visitor many opportunities for nature study.
